APPENDIX C Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 CPDLC Pro Line Fusion® Avionics

N

NOTE

Refer to Rockwell Collins ATN and FANS Harmonized CPDLC Application Operator’s Guide (CPN 523-0822822) for more information covering CPDLC/ADS-C. Refer to Rockwell Collins publication Corporate Datalink System CMU-4000/RIU-40X0 (CPN 523-0790499), or the Rockwell Collins publication Regional Datalink System CMU-4XXX/RIU-40X0 (CPN 523-0818402) for more information on the Air Operations Center (AOC), Air Trafﬁc Services (ATS), or technical functions of the Datalink.
